createTable.remarks: type of the account: Person, Client, Contractor, Application

column.name: account_type_uid
column.remarks: Unique ID of title

column.name: account_type_name
column.remarks: Type of account: Person, Client, Contractor, Application

column.name: account_type_description
column.remarks: Description of this type

column.name: row_instance
column.remarks: FK to system instance

column.name: row_owner
column.remarks: FK to account_group - owner of this row

column.name: row_guid
column.remarks: global generated unique ID
column.defaultValueComputed: replace(concat('atyp_v01_', substring(cast(now() as text), 1, 10), '_', substring(cast(uuid_generate_v4() as text), 1, 13)), '-', '_')

column.name: row_version
column.remarks: version of the row

column.name: is_active
column.remarks: 0 - row has been logically deleted, 1 - row is still active

column.name: created_date
column.remarks: date and time of insertion given row to database

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: account UID of person that created this row

column.name: last_updated_date
column.remarks: date and time of last change of this row

column.name: last_updated_by
column.remarks: account UID of person that updated this row

column.name: removed_date
column.remarks: date and time of change this row

column.name: removed_by
column.remarks: account UID of person that removed this row
